locale.name: en_US
locale.message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this authentication source?
No authentication sources have been defined.

Your configuration file has been successfully updated. Please note that if your site no longer functions correctly you may need to manually fix your configuration by editing <tt>config.inc.php</tt> directly.
Are you sure you want to clear the cache of compiled templates?
Are you sure you want to expire all user sessions? All users who are currently logged into the system will be forced to log in again (yourself included).

The contents of your updated configuration are displayed below. To apply the configuration changes you must open <tt>config.inc.php</tt> in a suitable text editor and replace its contents with the contents of the text field below.
Cannot open language descriptor from PKP web site.
Cannot add the new locale to the locale registry file, typically "registry/locales.xml".
This locale is the primary language of the site. You can't disable it until you choose another primary locale.
Are you sure you want to reload this locale? This will erase any existing locale-specific data such as customized email templates.
No additional locales are available for installation.
Your {$softwareName} installation automatically executed and finished this task and you can download the log file here: {$url}
Are you sure you want to delete all scheduled task execution logs?
The email address of the principal contact is required.
The name of the principal contact is required.
You must enter a minimum password length of at least 4 characters.

Your installation is configured to record more than one usage metric. Usage statistics will be displayed in several contexts. There are cases where a single usage statistic must be used, e.g. to display an ordered list of most-used submissions or to rank search results. Please select one of the configured metrics as a default.
Invalid site logo image format. Accepted formats are .gif, .jpg, or .png.
Invalid site style sheet format. Accepted format is .css.
The configuration file <tt>config.inc.php</tt> does not exist, is not readable, or is invalid.
Base path {$path} must be inside the public files directory.
Folder {$path} is not a directory or is not readable.
File {$filename} could not be moved from {$currentFilePath} to {$destinationPath}

Copy the passed apache access log file(s), filtering the entries related with this installation, to the current files directory, inside the UsageStatsPlugin stage directory. Must run under user with enough privilegies to read access apache log files.
This tool will only copy files that aren't already inside the usageStats file loader directories (stage, processing, archive, reject).
Usage: {$scriptName} path/to/apache/log/file.log Usage (processing all files inside a directory): {$scriptName} path/to/apache/directory
Error: File {$filePath} don't exist or can't be accessed.
Error: can't copy file from {$filePath} to {$tmpFilePath}
Warning: file {$filePath} already exists inside the usage stats directory.
The "{$utilPath}" program execution returned the following error: {$output}
Error: can't execute "{$utilPath}". Check your {$utilVar} setting in config.inc.php.
There are no locales available for download.
